agent_name: Platform Integration & Cloud + Package Management Specialist

g1.title: @kubernetes - Advanced Cluster Management
g1.description: Implemented advanced Kubernetes operations with pod management, deployment automation, service discovery, and cluster orchestration
features_implemented: Pod lifecycle management with health checks
Deployment automation with rolling updates and rollback
RBAC security policies and service accounts

g2.title: WebAssembly (WASM) Execution Platform
g2.description: Implemented WebAssembly compilation and execution for browser-based TuskLang runtime with full operator support and optimized performance
features_implemented: Rust-to-WASM compilation pipeline with size optimization
Browser execution environment with streaming compilation
NPM package generation with automated publishing
Service worker integration for offline capabilities

g3.title: @istio - Service Mesh Operations
g3.description: Implemented Istio service mesh integration with traffic management, security policies, observability, and circuit breaking

g4.title: Multi-Cloud Functions Integration
g4.description: Implemented unified serverless platform supporting AWS Lambda, Azure Functions, Google Cloud Functions with deployment automation
features_implemented: Unified deployment API for AWS Lambda, Azure Functions, GCP Functions

g5.title: Universal Package Manager Hub
g5.description: Implemented unified package management supporting npm, PyPI, crates.io, Maven, NuGet, RubyGems, and Composer with dependency resolution
features_implemented: Support for 7 major package managers (npm, PyPI, crates.io, Maven, NuGet, RubyGems, Composer)
Advanced dependency resolution with conflict detection
Security scanning with CVE database integration
Universal search across all package ecosystems
